resources.string:
Enter dates in this format separated by a space:
day month year 
Example:
31 12 2002
Or in the format with time:
31 12 2002 12 30
The data of the second date is earlier than the first, please try again.
The dates you entered are the same

You entered the date or time in the wrong format! 

Attention, if you entered one date with the date and time, then enter the second one in the same way. 
Please try again.

Get date information
Enter: day month year 
Example: 31 12 2022

Or you can use "current date" and click "get info"
You entered the date in the wrong format, please try again.

Date of birth information

Enter day month year
Example: 17 05 1990

Taurus Stones by Decades
 All of the stones listed are suitable for Taurus, however, some of them will be especially useful for those born in a certain decade of the period.
 1 decade (21.04 - 1.05) - diamond (brilliant);
 2nd and 3rd decade (02.05 - 21.05) - emerald and sapphire.

Which stone suits Sagittarius by decades:
 1st decade (November 23 - December 2) Those born in this period are cheerful and courageous people, always a little adventurers. Their talisman is an amethyst.
 2nd decade (December 3 - 12) People born in this period are changeable and dreamy. These are the most creative representatives of the sign. 
Their talisman is chrysoprase, which attracts money and grants independence.
 3rd decade (December 13 - 21) Representatives of the third decade are the most purposeful, they see no barriers to achieving goals. 
For those around them, they are like the sun, they can delight, warm or incinerate. 
Their talismans are two precious corundums, a ruby and a sapphire.

Lucky Capricorn stones by decade:
 1st decade (from December 22 to January 2) - topaz.
 2nd decade (January 3rd to 13th) - ruby.
 3rd decade (from January 14 to 20) - tourmaline and pomegranate.

Lucky stones of Aquarius by decades: 
1st decade (from January 21 to February 1) - patronizes Venus. 
These are sensitive and empathic natures who charm those around them with their calmness and get along well with them. 
At the same time, they often lack self-confidence. Pearls will help to harmonize this aspect.
 2nd decade (from February 2 to February 11) - are in the power of Mercury. 
They are distinguished by the desire to achieve any goal. Versatile intellectuals, they like to be in the spotlight. 
Amethyst will be a good talisman for them.
 3rd decade (February 12 to 18) - strongly influenced by the Moon. 
These are passionate fighters for justice, often overly stubborn and straightforward. 
Sapphire and topaz are able to balance these qualities.

Lucky Pisces stones by decade: 
1 decade (from February 20 to March 1) - a faceted amethyst will become an ideal talisman, 
Moonstone is also considered good from an energy point of view. 
2 decade (from March 2 to March 11) - we advise those born on these dates to choose white opal, 
rutile quartz, white pearl, white opal, hairy quartz. 
3 decade (from March 12 to March 20) - Several gems suit them at once: 
Alexandrite, aquamarine, chrysolite, emerald, sapphire, tourmaline.
Enter the year of birth in the range from 1012 to 5000
